spatial_accuracy.notes: The overall footprint and adjacency are well preserved. However, the outer walls have significant protrusions and exterior window frames (especially near Bed-2 and Bed-1) that do not exist in the 2D plan. Door swing directions are mostly accurate, but the entrance foyer scale is slightly elongated.

structural_fidelity.notes: Major violation regarding text labels; the AI hallucinated/preserved large text labels and measurement lines directly on the floor. An unrequested exterior deck was added bottom-left. The floating model requirement and roof removal are correctly handled.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent block-style furniture mapping. Most fixtures (sofas, rug orientation, kitchen sink/stove) are exactly where they should be at the correct scale.

aesthetic_quality.notes: The render fails the style constraint by used photorealistic textures (wood grain on floors, marble counters, foliage details) and dramatic warm interior lighting/shadows instead of flat shading. The camera angle is successfully isometric.

detected_errors.description: Critical failure to remove text labels and measurement lines from the floor plan in the 3D render.
Style violation: used realistic textures and dramatic interior lighting/glow instead of low-poly flat shading.
Hallucinated structural element: An extra wooden deck was added to the exterior of Bed-2/C.TOI wing.
Exterior wall distortions; the rendered model adds thickness and 'bump-outs' to exterior walls not shown in the source plan.
